title: Spellcheck

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If, at any point in the game and in any channel, someone makes a spelling mistake, kill them. Grammar and punctuation (except apostrophes) do NOT count. The death note will automatically be set to the correct spelling of the misspelled word. Edited messages that the host doesnâ€™t see will not count.
- Yes, you are affected by your attribute.

fields.name: Gaol:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
